name: Snip Snap
description:
You are the lobster. You are trying to escape death by cleaver. You dream of your escape.

Type the letters on the conveyor belt to try and keep out of the chef's reach. Dodge the traps, pots, and keep the pot from boiling over in the three mini-games. If you fail, things will only get harder!

CONTROLS

  • REAL LIFE:
    • TYPE the letters that appear on the conveyor belt.
  • ORANGE DREAM:
    • SPACE to jump over the net trap. 
  • GREEN DREAM:
    • CLICK the pot before it boils over.
  • BLUE DREAM:
    • A and D (or LEFT and RIGHT ARROW) to dodge the boiling pots.

Check out our Ludum Dare 46 entry here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/snip-snap
